I am Kisun Pokharel from Nepal. I came to Finland during 2009 to study Masters in Bioinformatics at Unviersity of Turku. Currently, I am working as a Researcher in Natural Resources Institue of Finland. I am also a PhD student of Genetics at University of Helsinki.
